verbose_text: Also, THY or benzaldehyde analogs, such as 2,3-DHBA and SA, can be used as potent chemosensitizing agents to enhance antifungal activity of AMB, ITZ, or PCS.
evidence: benzaldehyde analogs, such as 2,3-DHBA and SA, can be used as potent chemosensitizing agents to enhance antifungal activity of AMB, ITZ, or PCS
